Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.settings

Class ServerSettings

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.settings.ServerSettings
public class ServerSettings extends Object
The settings of the server application.

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerSettings

      public ServerSettings(int maxLobbies, VerbosityLevel verbosity)
      Create an object with the specified server settings. The port number is not specified and the port mode is AUTO.
      Parameters:
      maxLobbies - The maximum number of concurrency games on the server. If the specified value is less than 1, the DEF_MAX_LOBBIES value is assigned.
      verbosity - The verbosity level for logging.

    • ServerSettings

      public ServerSettings(int maxLobbies, int socketPort, int rmiPort, VerbosityLevel verbosity, PortMode portMode)
      Create an object with the specified server settings.
      Parameters:
      maxLobbies - The maximum number of concurrency games on the server. If the specified value is less than 1, the DEF_MAX_LOBBIES value is assigned.
      socketPort - The number of port used for the socket connection. If the value is less than 1024 or greater than 65535, the DEF_SOCKET_PORT value is assigned.
      rmiPort - The number of port used for the socket connection. If the value is less than * 1024 or greater than 65535, the DEF_RMI_PORT value is assigned.
      verbosity - The verbosity level for logging.
      portMode - The mode used to select the port number for the connection.

  • Method Details

    • defaultSettings

      public static ServerSettings defaultSettings()
      Returns:
      The default settings of the server.

    • parseFromJson

      public static ServerSettings parseFromJson(String json) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Parse a json text and return the ServerSettings object. The json text should have the following fields (case-sensitive):
      • "maxLobbies": integer, the maximum number of concurrent games (min=1).
      • "port": integer, the port number bound by the server (min=1024, max=65535).
      • "verbosity": string, the verbosity level for logging ("verbose", "info", "warning", "error").
      If a field is missing, or it has an invalid value, the default value of that setting is used.

      The json text can have duplicate fields and in that case the value assigned for the duplicated setting is one of the specified values. If the json text has extra fields, they are ignored.

      Parameters:
      json - The json text with the server settings.
      Returns:
      The object containing the specified server settings.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - If the text is not a valid json-formatted text.

    • loadJsonFile

      public static ServerSettings loadJsonFile(String fileName) throws IOException
      Load the server setting from a json file. The json text should have the following fields (case-sensitive):
      • "maxLobbies": integer, the maximum number of concurrent games (min=1).
      • "port": integer, the port number bound by the server (min=1024, max=65535).
      • "verbosity": string, the verbosity level for logging ("verbose", "info", "warning", "error").
      If a field is missing, or it has an invalid value, the default value of that setting is used.

      The json text can have duplicate fields and in that case the value assigned for the duplicated setting is one of the specified values. If the json text has extra fields, they are ignored.

      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the file to load.
      Returns:
      The object containing the server settings specified n the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the file does not exist.
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - If the text is not a valid json-formatted text.

    • loadJsonFile

      public static ServerSettings loadJsonFile(Path filePath) throws IOException
      Load the server setting from a json file. The json text should have the following fields (case-sensitive):
      • "maxLobbies": integer, the maximum number of concurrent games (min=1).
      • "port": integer, the port number bound by the server (min=1024, max=65535).
      • "verbosity": string, the verbosity level for logging ("verbose", "info", "warning", "error").
      If a field is missing, or it has an invalid value, the default value of that setting is used.

      The json text can have duplicate fields and in that case the value assigned for the duplicated setting is one of the specified values. If the json text has extra fields, they are ignored.

      Parameters:
      filePath - The path of the file to load.
      Returns:
      The object containing the server settings specified n the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the file does not exist.
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - If the text is not a valid json-formatted text.

    • parseMaxLobbies

      private static int parseMaxLobbies(String value)
      Convert a string to an integer that represents the max number of concurrent games on the server. If the string is not a valid integer, or the value is less than 1, the DEF_MAX_LOBBIES value is returned.
      Parameters:
      value - The text to parse.
      Returns:
      The integer parsed from text, representing the max number of concurrent games on the server.

    • parseSocketPortNumber

      private static int parseSocketPortNumber(String value)
      Convert a string to an integer that represents the socket port number bound by the server. If the string is not a valid integer, or the value is less than 1024 or greater than 65535, the DEF_SOCKET_PORT value is returned.
      Parameters:
      value - The text to parse.
      Returns:
      The integer parsed from text, representing the port number bound by the server.

    • parseRmiPortNumber

      private static int parseRmiPortNumber(String value)
      Convert a string to an integer that represents the rmi port number bound by the server. If the string is not a valid integer, or the value is less than 1024 or greater than 65535, the DEF_RMI_PORT value is returned.
      Parameters:
      value - The text to parse.
      Returns:
      The integer parsed from text, representing the port number bound by the server.

    • parsePortNumber

      private static int parsePortNumber(String value, int defaultValue)
      Convert a string to an integer that represents the port number bound by the server. If the string is not a valid integer, or the value is less than 1024 or greater than 65535, the default value is returned.
      Parameters:
      value - The text to parse.
      defaultValue - The default value.
      Returns:
      The integer parsed from text, representing the port number bound by the server.

    • parseVerbosity

      private static VerbosityLevel parseVerbosity(String value)
      Convert a string into a VerbosityLevel enum value. If the string cannot be converted, the DEF_VERBOSITY is returned. The valid string values are (case-sensitive):
      • "verbose"
      • "info"
      • "warning"
      • "error"
      Parameters:
      value - The text to parse.
      Returns:
      The verbosity level value.

    • parsePortMode

      private static PortMode parsePortMode(String value)
      Convert a string into a POrtMode enum value. If the string cannot be converted, the DEF_MODE_PORT is returned. The valid string values are (case-sensitive):
      • "auto"
      • "fixed"
      Parameters:
      value - The text to parse.
      Returns:
      The port mode value.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      The text representation of this server settings instance, formatted as:
      • [setting1:value1;setting2:value2;...]
